title: 整合包安装后启动游戏崩溃

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
更新启动器，https://ci.huangyuhui.net/job/HM ... bs/HMCL-3.2.145.exe

然后启动器设置，下载源，mcbbs

再删除 .minecraft\libraries文件夹

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
po123 发表于 2020-2-5 13:48
换了启动器后又这样怎么办
下载这个文件，https://c-t.work/s/c054980c5c4342 放入 .minecraft\assets\indexes 文件夹
